yaml.title: Story Behind Hacktoberst Kathmandu 2019
yaml.description: In 2018, I had participated in Hacktoberfest. The learning I got from participation helped me explore more about open-source culture.

markdown.markdown:
library(tweetrmd)


> Hacktoberfest is a worldwide celebration of open source software and is open for everyone! It is all about encouraging meaningful contributions to the open source ecosystem, for beginners and veterans alike.

In 2018, I started with a pull-request (hunting) in documentation part. I was glad that some of them got merged as well.

Finally, I also got some swags from Hacktoberfest.

{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
tweet_embed("https://twitter.com/bjungbogati/status/1086225680306704384")



Participating in Hacktoberfest motivated me to host a meetup in Kathmandu.

So, we made a project made a project hacktm.js.org, where participants can learn sending the pull requests.

{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
tweet_embed("https://twitter.com/DataSansar/status/1186284925399359488")

metadata.title: Story Behind Hacktoberst Kathmandu 2019
